info.designerBody: We strip away the unnecessary. No ruffles, no excess. Just structure and silhouette. Our designs are architectural blueprints for the body.
info.appointmentBody: Visit our showroom to feel the fabric quality. We offer private viewing sessions for wholesale partners.

atelier.title: Atelier Flow · Linear Precision
atelier.lede: Present the couture workflow like an interface so clients read fabric weight, sewing steps, and schedules as if browsing product specs.

timeline.title: DAY 01 · PATTERN SKETCH
timeline.desc: 72h sketching and draping; transparent taffeta calibrates the pattern.

timeline.title: DAY 04 · MATERIAL CURATION
timeline.desc: Champagne taffeta × matte pearl organza; log humidity and texture.

timeline.title: DAY 09 · FITTING
timeline.desc: Three fittings + laser embroidery alignment; keep a data log for every adjustment.

atelier.materialLabCopy: Record each material with high-key photography and sync to WebGL silk shader parameters for digital twins, keeping on/offline color temperature aligned.

couture.title: Book a White Phantom fitting
couture.copy: Each fitting happens in a frosted-glass quiet room with dawn-like ambient light. Stylists deliver a look sheet tuned to skin tone and occasion, synced with fragrance notes and fabric texture archives.
bullets: Fabric tactile archive + scent kit delivery
Sketch in 72 hours, first fitting in 14 days
couture.formCopy: Tell us your city and preferred date; the atelier will arrange the nearest White Phantom salon.

gallery.title: Vernissage · White Halo Showcase
gallery.lede: The asymmetric bento grid splits gowns, couture accessories, and material close-ups. Each card floats on the “atelier haze” with a 1px linear frame, revealing high-key highlights.

flow.caption: VERNISSAGE NOTES
flow.title: Gallery Flow
flow.copy: Enter to a central hero gown; material lab sits to the right, curated lookbooks to the left. Soundscape and lighting are layered with a sub-72dB breathing rhythm.
